path.label: United States
path.description: Data relating to the United States.
path.description_lead: Data relating to the United States.

path.label: U.S. Federal Government
path.description: Government from the Legislative, Executive, and Judicial branches of the United States of America.
path.description_lead: Government comprising the Legislative, Executive, and Judicial branches of the United States of America.

path.label: The White House
path.description: Located at 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue in Washington D.C., the White House has served as the home and office for every U.S. president since John Adams.
path.description_lead: Located at 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue in Washington D.C., the White House has served as the home and office for every U.S. president since John Adams.

immediate_nodes.label: White House Salaries
immediate_nodes.description: The White House has been required to deliver a report to Congress listing the title and salary of every White House Office employee since 1995.  Consistent with President Obama's commitment to transparency, this report is being publicly disclosed on our website as it is transmitted to Congress.  In addition, this report also contains the title and salary details of administration officials who work at the Office of Policy Development, including the Domestic Policy Council and the National Economic Council -- along with White House Office employees.

children_tables.label: White House Visitor Records
children_tables.description: Records of visitors to the White House from September 2009 to present.

children_tables.label: Nominations & Appointments
children_tables.description: The nominees and appointees names, positions, agencies under which they are nominated or appointed, the agency's websites, nomination dates, and vote confirmation dates.

children_tables.label: Tax Reform Ideas Submitted by the Public
children_tables.description: Submitted by the public to the President's Economic Recovery Advisory Board (PERAB).

children_tables.label: White House Office Employee Salaries - 2009
children_tables.description: Since 1995, the White House has been required to deliver a report to Congress listing the title and salary of every White House Office employee. Consistent with President Obama's commitment to transparency, this report is being publicly disclosed on the White House open data portal as it is transmitted to Congress.
